BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Refactor file path resolution for entitlements (#127040) This change refactors the known directory resolution such as modules, plugins, lib, etc. into a PathLookup. This is one of the steps towards allowing unit tests to provide their own PathLookup for resolution so we can enable entitlements there. ES-11584

COMMIT.MESSAGE: ESQL: Rework FieldExtractorIT's pragmas This reworks the way `FieldExtractorIT` requests fields to be loaded. Previously it used pragmas and would skip itself if it wasn't a unit test. This removes that behavior and sends pragmas but also sends the `accept_pragma_risks` option which is used in production releases to allow pragmas - it's especially useful for testing. This *should* make the tests more consistent. Closes #127100
